parameters.name: ConfigId
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration. You can call the [ListVideoProcessings](~~ListVideoProcessings~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: FlvSeekEnd
parameters.description: The custom end parameter for FLV files.

parameters.name: FlvSeekStart
parameters.description: The custom start parameter for FLV files.

parameters.name: FlvVideoSeekMode
parameters.description:
FLV Seeking Valid values:

*   by_byte: Seek by byte.
*   by_time: Seek by time.

parameters.name: Rule
parameters.description:
The content of the rule. A conditional expression is used to match a user request. You do not need to set this parameter when you add global configuration. Two scenarios:

*   true: Match all incoming requests
*   Set the value to a custom expression, for example: (http.host eq "video.example.com"): Match the specified request

parameters.name: RuleEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the rule. Valid values: You do not need to set this parameter when you add global configuration. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The rule name. You do not need to set this parameter when you add global configuration.

parameters.name: Sequence
parameters.description: The order in which the rule is executed. A smaller value gives priority to the rule.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.

parameters.name: VideoSeekEnable
parameters.description:
Video seeking. Valid values:

*   on
*   off
